text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews So Trump sits on his butt for two months, ignoring experts, and takes no action to reduce the impact of COVID-19 in the US.  Millions lose their jobs. He claims no responsibility. Now he takes credit for people going back to work. Yep, confirmed.  Trump is delusional.
